### USAGE ###
>        /weights
>        /master/weights

### TL;DR; ###
Updates weights for the specified roles.

### DESCRIPTION ###
PUT: Validates the request body as JSON
and updates the weights for the specified roles.


### AUTHENTICATION ###
This endpoint requires authentication iff HTTP authentication is
enabled.
